A timeless world of waking dreams.

How do I boil an egg perfectly?
Place eggs in cold water, bring to a rolling boil, then turn off the heat and cover. After 8–10 minutes, transfer them to ice water for an easier peel.
Explain the difference between RAM and a hard drive.
RAM is temporary, fast-access memory used for active tasks. A hard drive (or SSD) is long-term storage for files and programs.
